resources.string: Welcome to Harmonizer! This is the app where you can generate beep sounds to censor something weird like *BEEP* and *BEEEEEEP*, etc.
Press the add button to add the current frequency to your favorite list. Long-press for more actions.

I go to the hills when my heart is lonely
I know I will hear what I've heard before
Your heart will be blessed with the sound of %s
And you can sing using Harmonizer
